title: iOS 12 and macOS 10.14 have a weird default font
body:
### Description

https://bugs.chromium.org/p/skia/issues/detail?id=8432

I noticed that when using the iOS 12 simulator, the font from:

```csharp
SKTypeface.FromFamilyName(null);
```

I no longer get "Helvetica" as with iOS 11, but now "Academy Engraved LET".
